Functions
PathCanonicalize
PathCanonicalize(
path
)

Simplifies a path by removing navigation elements such as "." and ".." to produce a direct, well-formed path.

Parameters
path

path to be canonicalized

Returns

canonicalized path

AutoHotkey Version

Tested & developed with Autohotkey 2.0-a104

Encoding

Unicode / ASCII

References

  • Microsoft Documentation, esp. PathCanonicalizeA and PathCanonicalizeW

PathCombine
PathCombine(
dirname,
filename
)

Concatenates two strings that represent properly formed paths into one path; also concatenates any relative path elements.

Parameters
dirname

first path

filename

second path

Returns

concatenated path string

AutoHotkey Version

Tested & developed with Autohotkey 2.0-a104

Encoding

Unicode / ASCII

References

  • Microsoft Documentation, esp. PathCombineA and PathCombineW

PathFixSlashes
PathFixSlashes(
path
)

Fixes slashes in path by replacing forwarslashes with backslashes

Parameters
path

path to be fixed

Returns

path with fixed Slashes

AutoHotkey Version

Tested & developed with Autohotkey 2.0-a104

Encoding

Unicode / ASCII

RE_PATH

Helper Class with Constants, defining required regular expressions

Variables
SLASH

RegEx describing Slashes

NOTSLASH

RegEx describing Not-Slashes

DRV_VOL

RegEx describing Drive-volume of a Windows-Path

UNC_VOL

RegEx describing Drive-volume of a Windows-Path, i.e. "\\pcjok/test"

WIN32_ROOT

RegEx describing valid rootdir on windows systems
